sections.text: communication system, defined.Electronic communication system means any wire, radio, electromagnetic, photooptical, or photoelectronic facilities for the transmission of electronic communications and any computer facilities or related electronic equipment for the electronic storage of such communication.SourceLaws 2002, LB 1105, ยง 140.

86-278.Electronic communication system, defined.

Electronic communication system means any wire, radio, electromagnetic, photooptical, or photoelectronic facilities for the transmission of electronic communications and any computer facilities or related electronic equipment for the electronic storage of such communication.

SourceLaws 2002, LB 1105, ยง 140.
